nodes.text: Clan Kelborn was a Mandalorian clan in existence following the time of the Mandalorian Wars. When Jicoln Cadera rebelled against the Sith-favoring reign of Mandalore the Vindicated, Clan Kelborn was one of several clans that rallied to Cadera's side. Cadera and his clan's movement was defeated, Clan Kelborn was accepted back by Mandalore, and continued to be a respected part of the Mandalorian culture.
Merrk Kelborn served as a Rally Master during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, and could often be found at the Mandalorian enclave on the planet Dromund Kaas.

Clan Kelborn was first introduced to Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a MMORPG created by BioWare and released December 20, 2011. The clan shares its name with the character Kelborn from Obsidian's game, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords.
